H0.text: Which Lancashire born entertainer was deported from South Africa in 1946 for his refusal to play to white-onle audiences and was indeed cheered by a black audience after embracing a small black girl who had presented his wife with a box of chocolates . George Formby

H1.text: Which Lancashire born entertainer was deported from South Africa in 1946 for his refusal to play to white-onle audiences and was indeed cheered by a black audience after embracing a small black girl who had presented his wife with a box of chocolates . Gracie Fields

H2.text: Which Lancashire born entertainer was deported from South Africa in 1946 for his refusal to play to white-onle audiences and was indeed cheered by a black audience after embracing a small black girl who had presented his wife with a box of chocolates . Frank Randle

H3.text: Which Lancashire born entertainer was deported from South Africa in 1946 for his refusal to play to white-onle audiences and was indeed cheered by a black audience after embracing a small black girl who had presented his wife with a box of chocolates . Beryl Formby

A4.text: Randle was born in Aspull, near Wigan, Lancashire.
